mapper.select: SELECT TEAM.NAME FROM COLOR JOIN TEAM ON TEAM.COLOR_ID = COLOR.COLOR_ID WHERE COLOR.NAME LIKE #{this}
SELECT PLAYER.FIRST_NAME as first_name, PLAYER.LAST_NAME as last_name FROM PLAYER JOIN TEAM ON TEAM.TEAM_ID = PLAYER.TEAM_ID WHERE TEAM.NAME LIKE #{this} ORDER BY PLAYER.PPG DESC

SELECT PLAYER.FIRST_NAME as first_name, PLAYER.LAST_NAME as last_name, PLAYER.UNIFORM_NUM as uniform_num FROM PLAYER JOIN TEAM ON TEAM.TEAM_ID = PLAYER.TEAM_ID JOIN STATE ON TEAM.STATE_ID = STATE.STATE_ID JOIN COLOR ON TEAM.COLOR_ID = COLOR.COLOR_ID WHERE STATE.NAME LIKE #{team_state} AND COLOR.NAME LIKE #{team_color}
SELECT PLAYER.FIRST_NAME as first_name, PLAYER.LAST_NAME as last_name, TEAM.NAME as team_name, TEAM.WINS as num_wins FROM PLAYER JOIN TEAM ON TEAM.TEAM_ID = PLAYER.TEAM_ID WHERE TEAM.WINS > #{this}
